title: Stylish Xi'an Stay within One of China's Ancient Capitals
description: Escape to China's Shaanxi Province with a stay at the stylish voco Xi'an ETDZ, an IHG Hotel, in one of China's thousand-year-old ancient capitals. Adjacent to Xi'an's municipal hub and luscious City Sports Park green zone, the hotel is centrally located for exploring the city's vibrant attractions and thriving businesses. Visit Emperor Qinshihuang's Mausoleum Site Museum and the iconic Terracotta Army, before returning to this sophisticated hotel with a modern gym and sumptuous dining.
location_description: voco Xi'an ETDZ, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 39 Fengcheng 9th Road, ETDZ Xi'an 710018, China

title: Sophisticated Stay Steeped in Chinese History with Onsite Pool, Dining & Spa
description:
Find timeless elegance at the heart of Xi’an, where history and luxury collide within the majestic Ming Dynasty Xi'an City Wall, one of the best preserved ancient walls in China. History meets sophistication and luxury at this distinguished hotel, with effortless access to the city's ancient wonders, including the awe-inspiring Terracotta Warriors and the Bell Tower of Xi'an.

Set amid exquisite gardens, this architectural gem blends French sophistication with Sino-Russian charm. Indulge in opulent amenities, including a lavish spa, an indoor pool, two bars and Dolce Vita Restaurant serving authenic Italian cuisine. This sanctuary of heritage and opulence places you in the very soul of a city that once ruled thirteen dynasties.
location_description: Sofitel Legend Peoples Grand Hotel Xian
offer_address: 319 Dong Xin Street, Xin Cheng Qu, Xi'An, Shaanxi 710004, China

title: China Sky-High Opulence in Xi’an with Five Eateries & Mountain-View Rooftop Garden
description:
Take in Xi’an from new heights at Grand Hyatt Xi’an, a glamorous retreat in the heart of the city’s CBD. Wake to skyline views from your floor-to-ceiling windows, take a dip in the sparkling indoor pool, keep up with your routine in the fitness centre or recharge with an indulgent treatment at the spa.

In between exploring the city’s historic treasures - including the Terracotta Warriors - refuel at one of the hotel’s dining venues. Savour Cantonese dishes at Chang'an Bridge, complete with a wood-fired duck oven, or dive into hot pot at Maple House. Enjoy international fare at Grand Café and enjoy live cooking stations, linger over afternoon tea at The Lounge, or settle in at Allegro for cocktails and live music.
offer_address: No 12 Jinye Road, Xi'an, Shaanxi Province 710065, China

title: Xi'an Cosmopolitan Luxury with Four Restaurants & Tranquil Day Spa
description: Home to the Terracotta Army -  one of the most famous archaeological finds in the world - Xi'an is a treasure trove of wonders, yours to explore from Crowne Plaza Xi'an, an IHG Hotel. When you're not deep diving into fascinating history, return to your hotel spa for a massage, hydrotherapy session or a steam in the sauna. For dinner, you're spoilt for choice: choose from international buffets, authentic Tanjia, Cantonese, and Shaanxi cuisine, succulent steaks and Shaanxi-style barbecue.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Xi'an, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 1 Zhu Que Zhong Road, Xi'an 710061, China

title: Contemporary Xi'an Hyatt Escape with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description:
Discover Xi'an, a historic Silk Road city where cutting-edge innovation and ancient history collide. Set in the city's vibrant hi-tech zone, this contemporary retreat blends modern sophistication with the storied charm of one of China's most fascinating destinations.

The hotel's prime location puts remarkable attractions within easy reach. Make use of the city's exceptional metro system to explore the Giant Wild Goose Pagoda or the Bell Tower of Xi'an, or take a taxi ride to access UNESCO World Heritage sites like Emperor Qin Shi Huang's Mausoleum, home to the Terracotta Warriors. After days exploring, savour authentic Chinese fare and signature cocktails at Zhangba N°2 Restaurant & Bar.
offer_address: 3500 Yuhua 1st Road, Yanta District, Xi'an 710076, China

title: Elegant Xi'an Sojourn within One of China's Four Great Ancient Capitals
description: Escape to one of China's Four Great Ancient Capitals with a stay in the heart of the Shaanxi Province in central China at the sophisticated InterContinental Xi'an North, an IHG Hotel. Discover the renowned city home to the iconic Emperor Qinshihuang's Mausoleum Site Museum and Xi'An's iconic Terracotta Army, before returning to this five-star hotel, where you can enjoy a dip in the futuristic pool and dine at any of the four onsite restaurants, each offering an authentic dining experience.
location_description: InterContinental Xi'an North, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.120 Fengcheng 8th Road, Jingkai District, Xi'an, 710021, China

title: Sleek and Modern Xi’an Luxury with Two Onsite Restaurants & Bar
description: Get friendly with the rich history and modern luxury of the InterContinental Xi'an Hi-Tech Zone, an IHG Hotel. Nestled in the heart of Xi'an's bustling tech district, this hotel offers contemporary elegance with inspiration from oriental gardens and Tang Dynasty-era design elements. After a day of discovery, retreat to Cai Feng Lou Chinese Restaurant for a hearty Chinese meal, or savour a creative cocktail at the relaxed Lab Bar.
location_description: InterContinental Xi'an Hi-Tech Zone, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 11 Tuan Jie Nan Lu, Gaoxin District, Xi'an Xi'an 710000, China
